  • Urbs Editor
  • buildings_editor.js
  • View page source

buildings_editor.js

prepareBuildingsObject(UrbsPropertiesJSON)

called during setup of the urbs editor window Fills the buildingsPropertiesList with dicts containing rudimentary information about each building Properties of a building are determined by the UrbsPropertiesJSON and set to null initially, while names and coordinates are extracted from the corresponding buses

Arguments:

  • UrbsPropertiesJSON (dict) – contains information about all inputs for all urbs setup features

fillSelectedFeatureBuildingEditor(target)

onclick method for bus circlemarkers on the map and onchange method of the buildings list element resets the style of the previously selected bus and fills all editor input fields with the correct values

Arguments:

  • target (event_target_object) – the map object that has been selected

writeBackEditedBuildingFeatures(target)

onchange function for all building editor input fields writes changed value back to the relevant entry in the BuildingsObject

Arguments:

  • target (event_target_object) – the html editor element that has been changed
